players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. We must vote her out."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated her and she is mafia. She's trying to frame me to save herself."
Bob: "I think Alice is telling the truth and Diana is lying. We should vote out Diana."
You: "Diana is clearly the mafia trying to frame me. Bob sees through her lies. Vote Diana to save the town."
Diana: "Bob, Alice is lying. I'm the detective and she's mafia. Don't let her trick you into voting me out."
